attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of having all the MPs, and them having to come into Westminster every day etc., why not have real democracy, where any proposed law, instead of them arguing and deciding, have a website where the PEOPLE can vote on if it should be passed or not.
That would be democracy way ahead of any country.
Use IPs to prevent people double-voting, as well as those out of the UK voting.

Alternatively, have the MPs all have a computer with webcams, and they can stay at home and discuss that way.
(There is an online school I know, done using webcams for children of an International orginsiation which is very succesful!)
